title: Amtrak Email Campaigns
content:
These HTML email campaigns were created for Amtrak while I was working as a freelancer at Olson, a Minneapolis-based advertising agency. Each design represents a unique email campaign that I developed from concept to production-ready HTML. The emails were built to render consistently across all major email clients and tested thoroughly using Litmus before deployment.

Working within the constraints of email HTML (table-based layouts, inline styles, and varying client support) required creative problem-solving to achieve the desired visual design while maintaining cross-client compatibility. Each campaign was tailored to specific marketing objectives and aligned with Amtrak's brand guidelines.

images.caption: Amtrak Campaign: Marketing email designed and coded for Amtrak at Olson agency. Built with table-based layouts and inline CSS for cross-client compatibility.
Promotional Campaign: Customer-facing email promoting Amtrak services. Tested across multiple email clients using Litmus to ensure consistent rendering.
Newsletter Design: Email campaign with structured content hierarchy, designed to drive engagement and click-through rates.
Marketing Email: Campaign email featuring Amtrak offerings, built to brand specifications with responsive considerations for mobile viewing.
Customer Communication: Email template designed for Amtrak customer outreach, coded and tested for deployment through their email platform.
